text: Howie Davis was a native of Far Rockaway, New York who founded the Harlem Wizards basketball team. He worked for many years as a sports promoter. He was a promoter for the Brooklyn Dodgers and the Staten Island Stapes football teams. He raised over 150 million dollars for schools. ==References== Category:American sports businesspeople Category:Brooklyn Dodgers (NFL) Category:Staten Island Stapletons Category:People from Far Rockaway, Queens Category:Year of birth missing
title: Howie Davis
